tidymods.configuration.categories.toolti: Configure how mods are organized into categories.
tidymods.configuration.category_icons.to:
Texture mappings for category icons.

Format: §7category;namespace:path/to/texture.png§f

Example: §7libraries;minecraft:textures/item/book.png§f
tidymods.configuration.category_override:
Custom category assignments that override built-in defaults.

Format: §7modid;category§f

Example: §7jei;utility§f
tidymods.configuration.configs_only.tool: Only shows mods that have a configuration screen.
Category assigned to mods without a predefined category.

This category always appears at the bottom of the list.

§7Translatable via:§f §6tidymods.category.<name>§f
Fallback texture for mods without an icon.

Used when category icons are disabled.

Format: §7namespace:path/to/texture.png§f
tidymods.configuration.entries.tooltip: Configure what information appears in mod list.
tidymods.configuration.entry_show_author: Shows the author names next to each mod name.
tidymods.configuration.entry_show_versio: Shows the version number next to each mod name.
tidymods.configuration.filtering.tooltip: Control which mods appear in the list.
tidymods.configuration.hidden_mods.toolt:
List of mod IDs to hide from the mod list.

Format: §7modid§f

Example: §7examplemod§f
tidymods.configuration.hide_config_butto:
Hides the configuration buttons.

Website and issue buttons remain visible.
tidymods.configuration.libraries_at_bott: Places the libraries category at the bottom, below the default category.
tidymods.configuration.print_uncategoriz:
Logs all uncategorized mods to the console during startup.

Useful for identifying mods that need category assignments.
tidymods.configuration.show_mod_count.to: Shows the total number of loaded mods in the screen title.
tidymods.configuration.show_mod_ids.tool: Displays technical mod IDs instead of human-readable names.
tidymods.configuration.title: §lTidy Mods
tidymods.configuration.tooltip_show_auth: Includes author information in the mod tooltip.
tidymods.configuration.tooltip_show_desc: Includes the mod description in the mod tooltip.
tidymods.configuration.tooltip_show_lice: Includes license information in the mod tooltip.
tidymods.configuration.tooltips.tooltip: Configure what information appears in mod tooltips.
tidymods.configuration.use_category_icon: Uses a shared icon for all mods in each category instead of individual mod icons.
tidymods.description.tidymods: A tidy and organized replacement for the default mod list screen.
tidymods.gui.title: Mods
tidymods.configuration.hide_realms_butto: Hides the Realms button on the title screen.
